settings.name: Object name with time variables
settings.description: Provide the name of the move object containing the table of start and end timestamps (e.g. 'nest' for output of Nest Detection App).

settings.name: Track name variable
settings.description: Provide the name of the variable indicating the individual tracks to filter. This must overlap with tracks IDs of the data set that shall be filtered.

settings.name: Start time variable name
settings.description: Provide the name of the variable indicating the individual track start times.

settings.name: End time variable name
settings.description: Provide the name of the variable indicating the individual track end times.
